title: Best of The Herd for Mar 16, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 16, 2020
description:
Dak gets the franchise tag from the Cowboys

The new NFL CBA is about the middle class

Most teams were not interested in signing Tom Brady

Dak isn't worth the contract he wants 


Guests: Jay Glazer, FOX NFL Analyst

Joe Banner, former Eagles President & Browns CEO

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
